website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight wearable blanket in a comforting cocoon shape. Follows the American Academy of Pediatrics recommendations, along with a compelling price.
pros: 100% cotton material with tasteful design details
Consumers rave about the shoulder snaps and how they translate into many situations where you can place a sleeping baby into this outfit for bedtime or a nap without waking him or her
cons: Some consumers have had less than perfect experience with the glow in the dark zippers
Also be careful of sizing as your baby is growing

customer_reviews.title: This weight is perfect for air conditioned homes
customer_reviews.text: As a grandmother I understand the danger of blankets in cribs. Also, as a grandmother , I couldn't stand the thought of our grandbaby lying in a crib. in pj's, with no covering. This sleep sack accomplishes both by giving warmth in a safe way. This weight is perfect for air conditioned homes, even out into the warm summer. It is easy to put on, is roomy without being bulky, and is easily washed and dried. We can't say enough positive things about this product! If you have a baby, you really need one of these sacks!
customer_reviews.author: Grace's D

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for babies
customer_reviews.text: This product is not safe for babies. The arm and neck are way too big, even though my son is at the top of the weight limit for the size. He can get his arms out of the arm holes and through the neck which basically makes it so the whole thing can just slide down him and become a hazard in his crib. I’ve also seen him pull it up over his face while he’s wearing it. I am going to go find a different sleep sack that’s safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality buttons, zipper and cloth
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleep sack. Its double layer of thin cotton material that adds up to .6 tog. They also make a fleece on thats a high tog if you need more warmth. The zipper is good quality and so far has stood the test of time, sleep and many washes. The buttons on the shoulders are good quality and I've never had any issue with the button coming undone while baby sleeps; not once and my baby moves A LOT at night.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Love this sleep sack!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sleep sack! We live in Texas and keep the house at 70 degrees at night, a tad on the chilly side. This sleep sack is the perfect weight. I've used this sleep sack with 2 kids now, to the point that it's starting to wear at the edges and I need to buy another one. It has held up VERY well to the amount of use it's gotten! I will say, while the shoulder snaps might be nice with a young baby. They make it easy for a toddler to escape. I solved this problem in 30 seconds by seeing the shoulders shut. A quick stitch at the sewing machine on each shoulder, problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Quality spring/fall sack
customer_reviews.text: Great sleep sack overall. Love the color beige color and the single snaps at each shoulder which makes sliding in/out easy. I don't generally love the zippers that go from top down but I guess it's helpful when changing diapers and the zipper is sturdy. I bought this to be the summer sack but it's much thicker/warmer than a muslin/light sack. I'd say this one is ideal for spring/fall.
customer_reviews.author: Allison30Something

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son is 21 months and loves his sleep sack. It is also a helpful little ritual that helps him go “night night.” Helps keep him warm without a blanket (he tosses like all little ones). Plus, he pees - a lot - and the extra layer helps keep the sheets clean when he soaks through his night time diaper. He even likes to keep it on in the morning for a while too. It is pretty funny watching him shuffle. We wash it a couple times a week and it has not had any wear. Great quality. It is also worth noting that our neighbors tried one on their 2 year old and now he prefers sleeping with it.
customer_reviews.author: John Uhl

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Pricy though and wish it were bigger
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleep sack. I have a big 2yr 2 month old. He fits in it but there is little room to spare. I’m grateful to find a sleep sack this big but wish it were even bigger. This will last till he is 2.5 years old tops. Excellent quality. Heavier than a Muslin 4 layer blanket but certainly not too hot. Love it. Just wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: cozy
customer_reviews.text: I love this sleeping bag. The fabric is really soft, comfy and the bag itself is true to size. We bought a large size and it fits our 18 montus daughter perfectly,leavining enoughspace for her to wear it for a while from now on. Downside: no adjusting option for the underarms, which may be a little uncomfortable for the parents who intend to buy this for newborns.
customer_reviews.author: Jhon Cupidon

customer_reviews.title: Truly lightweight for summer sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Best sleep sack for summer time. Light weight and breathable. My home is set at 75 degrees and baby doesn't sweat in this sleep sack. Expensive but worth it. It is big for fitting though. Bought a large size first but it was too big for my 13 month old, it is really really big and long. Changed to medium size it is perfect. Medium size is lighter than large, with no lining inaide.
customer_reviews.author: Eva W.Brodbeck

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep sack!
customer_reviews.text: I love all baby deedee products! I have the comforter, fleece and now the cotton one. They are all long and perfect for all of the different seasons. I wish they made the footer ones too since my son is almost 3ft and I am not sure what I will do in another year. He moves too much to give him a blanket and he love this! Only downside is drying them. Make sure to dry them inside out and usually needs more time than other clothes but other than that this thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A

customer_reviews.title: Too hot
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it was cotton, but the double layer of cotton has proved to be too hot for my little one. He's complained every time we tried to put it on him that he was too hot. I was looking for something that was bigger than the Halo cotton sleepsack (as the big kid version of that is polyester, I didn't want to go that route), and was hoping this cotton sleepsack would do the trick. It is longer than the Halo sleepslack, but also a little more narrow (ie tight) in the body.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S

customer_reviews.title: I was able to return it and was torn between this company and another but ultimately chose this one because it really is a nice blanket for warmer nights and the material holds up ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered ended up losing its zipper in the dryer after a couple months of use. I was able to return it and was torn between this company and another but ultimately chose this one because it really is a nice blanket for warmer nights and the material holds up well in the washer and dryer. It was just unfortunate about the zipper that first time around.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Such a soft sleep sack!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sleep sack! It is soft, a breeze to put on due to the shoulder snaps and despite being two layers, it doesn't feel too hot even in the summer (we live in Texas). The only thing I wish is that it zipped down the side instead of the front but overall it hasn't ended up being a problem. My son is a tummy sleeper and sleeps great in this.
customer_reviews.author: Erin J

customer_reviews.title: I want one for me
customer_reviews.text: This is my second light weight one of these for my boy (he grew out of the last one) and I love it. It’s perfect over a long sleeved onesie for those warm or temperate nights/naps. I find that if he has pants on it catches on the jersey, but I also bought a fleece one and that doesn’t happen. Fleece is PERFECT for Cool PNW nights! love the shoulder snaps, the zipper that starts at the chin. Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: RN_Mama

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for bigger sizes
customer_reviews.text: Not many brands offer larger sleep sacks so this was a new brand for me. I am happy with the purchase. I do disagree with the warmth ratings, I find this one plenty warm enough for these cold nights. We keep our rooms about 66-67 degrees at night and my son wears a fitted pajama and this and seems comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Darling

customer_reviews.title: snap shoulders so I can easily put sleeping baby in sack without waking while trying ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I've been looking for. Breathable soft fabric that is still warm, snap shoulders so I can easily put sleeping baby in sack without waking while trying to thread arms into holes like other brands, and zips from top to bottom making diaper changes a breeze. I will never use another sleep sack. This was perfect weight for us for winter spring and fall, used the sleep nest lite in summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I used to put my now 20-month-old ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I used to put my now 20-month-old in sleep sacks from like 7 months until 14 months, which at that point he was too big... but he has climbed out of the crib a few times in the past month and we weren't quite ready to transition to a toddler bed yet, so I ordered this and its worked out great! He sleeps well in it and its plenty big, and he also hasn't tried to climb out of his crib.
customer_reviews.author: mtesbs8916

customer_reviews.title: Well-made!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality sleep sack for the price. It's a bit thicker than I was expecting but I was hoping it would be so I am very happy. Very soft - good zipper quality - washes/dries well. I use the shoulder snaps more than I thought I would. Beautiful subtle colors. I got the largest size for our 20 month old toddler who sleeps better when she is wearing a sleep sack. Very satisfied with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MeandI

customer_reviews.title: This is a MUST HAVE !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the baby deedee sleep nest during cold winter and had to switch to something lighter weight for the warm nights. I just received this yesterday and absolutely love it. Quality is amazing, it is the perfect thickness, plenty of room for my girl to grow in and safe! She loved it and even told me "thank you mommy for my blanket"... she is not even 2 yet ! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Sarita Rasulzad

customer_reviews.title: We love the heavier weight Baby Deedee
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a lighter-weight sleep sack to fit our 20 month old (34 in), and this was one of the few that was long enough, even after washing and drying. We love the heavier weight Baby Deedee, so we thought we'd give this one a try. It is super soft and fits our son well. The only con is that it is double-layer jersey, so on warm days, it is a little too heavy even over just shorts and a t-shirt.
customer_reviews.author: gayle c

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 7 month old. She’s 17 pounds, got her the Medium, it fits great and it’s so so soft. It washes very well too and is easy to take on and off. I love this brand, much softer than swaddleme and Halo!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I bought this weight for the summer. Spendy, but worth it. I bought two because he has usually peed through one of them and the other goes in the wash. But, that's a diaper problem... The zipper is nice and the snaps on the shoulders make install/removal VERY EASY. No velcro. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: MommaDuck

customer_reviews.title: The best sleep sacks there are!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only sleep sacks we will use. We have all the versions from light to heavy weight. The snaps make it so much easier to get LO in and out of and they are great and soft and wash well. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Allthethings

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep sack ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this sleep sack! It's double-thickness cotton so it's breathable but also the perfect warmth for moderate - cool temps. We also own the thicker Baby Deedee sleep sack. It's definitely much warmer (a great winter sleep sack in colder climates) and it's held up well and we plan to use it for baby #2. We've loved the snaps on the shoulders (easy in and out), zip up from the bottom for diaper changes, and we haven't experienced any chaffing due to the uncovered zipper base near our kiddo's neck like some reviews have mentioned. We'll definitely buy another Baby Deedee should we need one in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: These work well once baby is mobile/rolling over but still too young to put blankets in the crib. Makes me feel better/worry less about baby’s room getting too cold at night, knowing she’s wrapped up in this over her onesie.
customer_reviews.author: KHave

customer_reviews.title: great product but questionable delivery
customer_reviews.text: love this product. Have the heavy one and the lighter one is great just remember they run big. But for the first amazon said it was handed to some one at delivery and it was in the street not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loved this sleep sack. I have tons of them and this one was the only one we use. It’s perfect and easy to put her in when she is sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best on the market. My son does not like to be swaddled and never has so that may be one ofthe main reasons I love this over other products that come with a built in swaddle that velcros over the arms. This material is jersey knit so it's soft and holds up well trhough washings. It did not shrink after the first wash. The design is also superb for sleeping babies. Some days my son is awake when I place him in this, but when he's not this is really easily laid out and open to allow for the baby to be placed in it and zipped up. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F Siedsma

customer_reviews.title: Love shoulder snaps -- total game changer
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this sleep sack (we have two) for 8 months since our little guy graduated from his woombie at about 4 months. It is perfectly lightweight (we keep our house at about 72 degrees) and baby wears a onesie underneath. Love shoulder snaps -- total game changer. When baby used to submit to being changed on a table, would first snap, then zipper up. Now that he is less amenable to sitting still, we keep the bottom part zipped up and slide the sack up and snap the tops. On occasion, he will maneuver his way out of the sack in the morning, but not often enough to be a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Kacheek

customer_reviews.title: Baby sleeps through the night!
customer_reviews.text: My baby has used the heavy weight during winter and the lightweight during summer. They are comfy, keep my baby safe, and I love the snaps. I also have a Halo sack, and the Velcro would wake my baby up when I wrapped her up, and she hated having her arms pushed into sleeves when she was sleeping. With baby deedee, I just lay her down and silently zip and snap without added fuss. I just bought the largest size for winter this year.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Fox

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite style by far!
customer_reviews.text: The fact that this sleepsack zips up the front AND snaps at the shoulders is genius! We usually place our LO in the sleepsack before putting her to sleep, but sometimes we're not able to do so for whatever reason. With this design, you can lay the sleepsack out on the mattress, lay her down on it, and completely inconspicuously close it up without disturbing her at all! It's like magic!! :) My only complaint is that the fabric is a little heavy because it's lined. It's super soft and comfy though, which was great when it was colder, but now that it's warmer I worry that she may get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: T. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than the fleece one.
customer_reviews.text: At least 4 inches smaller than the same size, same brand in fleece. Already washed because I assumed it would fit.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep sack I've used
customer_reviews.text: After going through 7 other brands of sleepsacks (all because of broken zippers) I decided to try the Deedee out. I thought I wouldn't like the snaps on this but I happen to love the snaps! It is easier to get my daughter into the sleepsack because of the snaps. After using it for 4 months, the zipper hasn't broken or even snagged. Love this brand and this sleepsack sooooo much better than any other brand I've tried. Definitely worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: AshleyA

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These sleep sacks are very comfy, easy to put on and the quality is still good after months of washing.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Soft sleep sack!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Had the thicker Baby Deedee sleep sack and got this for the warmer months. The snap is tight enough that our one-year-old doesn't take it off, which is an important feature for good sleep (for his parents!). Seems breathable and cool enough that it's just the right amount of cover in our house (we let it get up to 76 in the summer inside). Soft material, wish it was a little cheaper, but a great sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: David Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Long and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of sleep sack. It's longer than the Halo brand so my tall toddler with long feet doesn't get too cramped. I especially like the shoulder snaps because if my kid gets too hot, she just takes the blanket off herself. Soft and cozy fabric
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Very soft quality material
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weight for all seasons. Super soft and love that there is a zipper or the buttons on the straps. My 9 month old has been sleeping well in this and we have had some really cold nights and a few hot ones recently.
customer_reviews.author: Pava1913

customer_reviews.title: The BEST sleepy sacks!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST sleepy sacks. I used many brands before finding these and they are by far my favorite. I buy them for every new mom I know! I love the perfect weight of the fabric, it's great for both winter and summer and everything in between. The snaps and zipper are also perfect and don't get stuck like other brands. They also go up to XL so I kept my daughter in her sleep sacks (she loved them!) until 18 months so I always knew she was comfy when she slept. LOVE LOVE LOVE these.
customer_reviews.author: L Susan

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Finally found one that works for us.
customer_reviews.text: LOOOOOVE IT!!! Soft, functional, cute. Awesome product. The arm hole is not too wide and the zipper is good quality. We bought the largest size so my then 9 month old baby (now 11 months) could grow into it eventually. I was tired of buying larger sizes every couple months with other brands. The only thing I don't like is the shoulder snaps. It touches the baby's face if he is sleeping on his side, and sometime it is freezing to the touch! Also, I wonder if it is nickel free. I hope so. :) Other than that, I love it and will be a forever Baby DeeDee consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny K.

customer_reviews.title: This was our favorite sleepsack company
customer_reviews.text: This was our favorite sleepsack company, wish they made them larger. Had to switch to another company that sells 3-6 yrs size and 6-10 yr size cause my son sadly outgrew these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE our Sleep Nest!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our sleep nest! When our 4.5 month old baby started rolling around in her crib, we knew it was time to end swaddling. The Deedee sleep nest is soft, breathable, yet warm enough to keep our baby snuggled up and comfy. We love that our baby can roll around safely with her arms free...she is able to roll herself back onto her back easily if she rolls onto her tummy at night. Love that it has shoulder snaps too (for when you don't want to wake your sleeping baby while putting them in their sleep nest).
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sleeping bag fr my little man. It is the perfect weight and warmth for our apartment in the fall/spring. The cotton is so soft and easy to wash. The buttons on the top are sometimes frustrating because little one likes to kick a lot so they unsnap but other then that no complaints. Colors are awesome also.
customer_reviews.author: Vasil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer sleeping blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoulder snaps. It fits my tall 22 month-old with room to grow. It has been washed multiple times and is holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Girl Wonder

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but not very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It's a great design and I love the snaps over the shoulders, but my whole purpose in buying this was to get something for the hot summer months. Its soft jersey fabric is very nice, but I think it's actually heavier than a normal cotton sleep sack you would see at the store. I really like it, but only giving it 2 stars because it is supposed to be lightweight and it's really not.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Summer Sleep Sack
customer_reviews.text: When the weather finally warmed up I bought this for my 9 month old son. It's the perfect weight....light enough for warm summer nights but heavy enough to keep him cozy when we have the air conditioning on. The sleep sack is extremely soft and washes well. The shoulder snaps are also helpful and make getting a squirmy baby into the sack a little easier. We use this every night and I couldn't be happier with it. My son is about 20 pounds and 29 inches long and the medium fits great.
customer_reviews.author: kdubs9928

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable, long
customer_reviews.text: Good product for us - lightweight fabric seems to be enough to keep our son warm on cooler spring/summer nights (we've used it, with pajamas, when outside temps are down to the 50s) without making him overwhelmingly sweaty when it gets hotter (80+ at night). The sack is quite long, which gives plenty of room to grow, but also leads to some bunching up due to normal nighttime tossing and turning. This doesn't seem to be a big problem, maybe because of the light weight of the cloth - our son has never seemed bothered by the tangle.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great sack though sadly my daughter's a gymnastics n still gets out of crib in it. Very light weight and I like how you can hide zipper tag!
customer_reviews.author: Hayli

customer_reviews.title: wish there was an XL !!!
customer_reviews.text: our favorite of all the ones we have used (halo, slumbersafe, aden anais) ... we have it in 3 different TOGs. but, at 2.5 our son is now too tall to be comfortable in it. wish there was an XL !!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep sack EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sleep sacks EVER!!! We have 2 of this type and 2 of the winter weight ones. We live in upper Minnesota where winters get COLD and my little guy was warm in this. Much warmer than the halo sleep sack or any of the fleece ones. This summer type one is like a light sheet on him. We absolutely love the baby deedee sleep sacks I tell everyone about them.
customer_reviews.author: MLM52

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey but worth the quality and long-term use.
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but we love it. Super soft. Thin. 100% cotton. Great for my toddler who has eczema and has to sleep covered up to prevent scratching. This is our third Baby Deedee Sleeping Bag (our first Nest Lite). Our first sack has held up for two fall/winters already before we outgrew it and it still has lots of use to it. Definitely will be handed down to our friend's baby.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken

customer_reviews.title: Durable well made sleep sack.
customer_reviews.text: Great for sleep training, babies see their sleep sack and they know it's time for night night. This product is so well made, breathes great, but warm as a blanket. The zipper is thick and strong, I used this on two babies and it still looks great. Some baby items are worth the extra money for quality, this is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: SDS

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Comfortable, snug but easy to get into thanks to the shoulder buttons.
customer_reviews.author: K V

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep sack!
customer_reviews.text: My little boy who is 6 months old was not sleeping at daycare and they can't use blankets in the cribs. The first day of using this, he took two naps during the day! It's nice and lightweight and the snaps are a great feature. I like the zipper and material better than on my halo sleepsacks. Will likely be buying more to use at home!
customer_reviews.author: Michael&Jeni Cody

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend both this light weight and heavier fleece version.
customer_reviews.text: Great sleep sack - well made, good sizing - with lots of room for wiggling.... purchased both the light weight and the heavyweight versions - helpful to have both on hand due to our frequent changes in weather and how thick her pajamas are (we have fleece carters pajamas). Feel free to size up as it will last you longer. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Sleep Sack Company
customer_reviews.text: Really have liked design and quality of these sacks. This was not our first one (I think 3rd). This is the lighter weight one, which is good for Southern California climate most of the year. We have their thicker one for winter since we cannot leave heater on overnight. Still long enough for my 2.5 year old (70th percentile), though she can take it off by herself now. (This keeps her entertained in the AM however.)
customer_reviews.author: natvh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light-weight sleep sack
customer_reviews.text: We loved this sleep sack so much with our first child that we bought another as a backup for our second kiddo. The material holds up well to frequent washing, and the zipper is quality. This is the perfect weight for Texas summer and fall weather. You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kayaram

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These sleep nests are the best! We use the lite for the summer (in AC home) and they provide some warmth without any over-heating. We purchased the largest size for our 96th% 8 month old and, while a little big, they fit well and will for a very long time. While these are expensive up front, you save so much money in the long run having a sleep sack that baby can use for (possibly) years to come. We're very happy.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Alternative to the Original
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the Baby Deedee original sleeping bag, but when our AC stopped working I ordered this immediately. It is lighter compared to the original, but still provides the weight and comfort of a blanket that my son seems to love. Baby Deedee is the only thing that's worked for us since having to stop swaddling with the Miracle Blanket many months ago. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Phelps

customer_reviews.title: This sleeping bag is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: It is made with a double layer of cotton and is both warm and breathable. My grandson wears it over a long sleeve one-sie without pajama bottoms when his nursery is relatively warm, or over pajamas and socks on colder nights. I thought he might need a sleep sack with openings for his feet in order to stand up in his crib, but learned that this is not necessary. He is easily able to stand up and cruise along the sides of his crib while weariing this sleep sack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST SLEEP SACK AROUND!!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST sleep sack around! We like this better than the zipper only sleep sacks because these have the AWESOME snaps at the shoulders. There's no more trying to wrestle the arm in the arm hole. Also, if the baby falls asleep, this is an easy fast way to cover them up without waking them up!
customer_reviews.author: Nick&Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great for California climate
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Baby Deedee brand. They make warm and cozy sacks for babies of all ages. I have the Nest and Nest Lite sacks for different climates in California. The Nest Lite is great for the warmer weather here. My baby also loved these sacks and gave him a good nights sleep. The only thing with this fabric in particular is that it will stretch out over time.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Martinear

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Cozy Jersey material. Perfect for winter in Florida because it isn't too warm. Love all my deedee purchases so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind and cozy sleep
customer_reviews.text: So far, we are pleased with the quality and durability of this product. It’s been a lifesaver in giving me peace of mind that my little one is not cold at night.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I like this. The size is good, use it for slightly cool temperature, like when the AC is on at night. The zipper can be of slightly better design, one has to be careful to close it all the way through. Otherwise, the baby's legs will find a way out and the zipper will be half-open by morning. A closing button would have been good. Still, its not much of a problem, so giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Psmom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sleepsack for older ones
customer_reviews.text: Our little one loves this sleepsack. We had it in a smaller size and ordered up when she outgrew her older one. It’s fantastic. The fabric is super soft, washes well and is breathable. Great product
customer_reviews.author: JenK

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleepsack. It’s super soft and excellent quality, I have washed it multiple times and there’s no issues. It’s the perfect thickness for summers in the south!
customer_reviews.author: Jess S

customer_reviews.title: They are a good weight to wear with cotton pajamas and are easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the heavy weight and light weight versions of these sleeping bags to use for my daughter between the ages of 1 and 2. They are a good weight to wear with cotton pajamas and are easy to put on and take off with the zipper and snaps at the shoulders. The zipper is good quality too, and doesn't bunch up after washings like others tend to do. Material washed nicely and has held up for over a year's use with weekly washes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the best sleep sack
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely the best sleep sacks. Easiest to get your kid in and out of, with the front zipper and the shoulder snaps. The material washes well, and they are very soft. My kid is happy to get into "blue sack" for naps and night. We have purchased lite versions and the heavier versions for winter in different sizes as my kid has grown. I highly recommend these to all my mom friends now.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleep sack for mid 60s/70s/80s degree weather. Light, airy weight without being too light, and very good construction. I wish the zipper upper and lower had a cover or something so that my LO was deterred from unzipping herself, but that's not too major.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to swaddling
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My little one hates being swaddled but she was born during winter in Minnesota so these are great for keeping her warm while she sleeps. The shoulder snaps make it easy to get her into the sleep sack without disturbing her if she's already fallen asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Olson

customer_reviews.title: Like a soft tee shirt
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very high quality, like two layers of your favorite loved tee shirt. I find that the large is the largest of the brands I've tried, perfect for my two year old. She figured out how to get the snaps off so I pinned the top with diaper pins. But I did love the snaps for ease of getting around the arms without having to force the arm open and in. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite sleep sack for warm nights
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sleep sack for warm nights. The material is like a thick soft t-shirt, and the wide top to bottom zipper and snaps on the shoulders make it easy to get on and off. We like it so much we bought another. We also have the regular thickness sleep sack for cool nights and highly recommend both. They are worth the extra expense.
customer_reviews.author: MWT

customer_reviews.title: Nice material
customer_reviews.text: My baby liked this sleep nest. Its cotton and shoulders button are so helpful. I just lay it on crib and without disturbing my baby put it on him. Going to buy one more
customer_reviews.author: PSingh

customer_reviews.title: overall a good sleep sack
customer_reviews.text: bought this one for warmer nights and the thicker one for the winter. Overall both are good but I deducted a star because of the zipper. I wish it was a little lower or somehow covered better so that the end metal piece doesn't rub against his chin. It's not a huge problem but once in awhile i notice that his chin is a little red if he moves around a lot while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it - light and soft
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleep sack. It's soft and light. We live in northern California and my son can wear this pretty much year round. So far, we've bought 3 baby Deedee sleep sacks. All great quality
customer_reviews.author: L. Evans

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Soft pure cotton. Very easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this sleep sack
customer_reviews.text: We now own four of these sleep sacks. They're lightweight, but add enough cover to keep baby snuggled.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vanecek

customer_reviews.title: Good materials-soft and not too thick for our home
customer_reviews.text: Good materials-soft and not too thick for our home... (Central air set to 74 degrees Fahrenheit). The only drawback for us is that the zipper is a bit chunky and hard so it could bother some babies. My little one is okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kau

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many of these sleep sacs for my kids, and also for friends. They are made of high quality materials and are quite durable. The lite sac is great for summer months, and we use the thicker one for the rest of the year. The snaps at the shoulder make for easy on and off, and the up-to-down zipper keeps baby's chin and face protected from scratches. There was a slight synthetic odor when I first took the sac out of the packaging, but it disappeared after the first wash. I am very happy with this product and definitely regard it as a staple for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: This sleep sack is one of my favorite baby products
customer_reviews.text: This sleep sack is one of my favorite baby products, and I purchased multiples of in different sizes. What makes it different from the rest on the market is that it is made from quilt, like a cover - my baby is warm and comfy. It is easy to put on without disturbing the baby because it opens up on shoulders. I absolutely love this sleeping bag and will recommend it to any mom!!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Safe and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this sack. Not easy for toddlers to open it and come out of it either which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: llcoolmg

customer_reviews.title: very soft but coming apart after only 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I'm super disappointed as we loved this when we got it for my 2 year old. Super soft. But we've only been using it 4 months and its got 2 holes in it near the bottom seam. I've been super careful and never even put it in dryer for fear of shrinkage, it shouldn't have holes in it so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it ! Don’t worry about sheets or blankets anymore thru the night! Soft and also keeps my child from climbing over the crib lol
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Israelsen

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this item and washed it for the first time and it shrunk so much that my baby is unable to wear it. Unfortunately can't return it either because it has been washed. Other than that the product is soft and looks so comfy I am so sad my baby wont get any use out of it. I would recommend to hang dry or order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Aden & Anais sleep sack
customer_reviews.text: I was using the A&A sleep sleep sacks for quite a while but kept having to replace/repair them because the zipper kept breaking. Then I was turned on to the Baby Deedee and never looked back. Much better quality zipper and the snaps at the top allow us to take the sack off more easily. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Limestone

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep sacks ever
customer_reviews.text: Easy to care for and you know your little one is comfortable in the correct temperatures! We use this one and the winter weight ones and we have loved them both! The only sleep sacks we use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this well made sleep sack. Easy put it on and off and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mtuya

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep sacks
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I love the snaps at the shoulders in case we need to take it off/on without waking him. One complaint is that the zipper is a bit noisy and can wake baby if he's not soundly asleep. I love that these sleep sacks fit such a wide range, my baby grows quickly and with these I'm not needing a new size every month.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: We love the sleep sack. With our baby in particular she moves a lot when she sleeps (all over the place) so you can imagine a blanket never stays on her. This is the perfect solution and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Samson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: We love this and own 6 in various sizes and weights. They just wash up so well and are so soft. I've purchased several brands of sleep sacks - some even pricier and these are the only ones I've returned to buy more of.
customer_reviews.author: Kbates

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight and perfect as an added layer over pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Soft cotton and colors. Nice weight and perfect as an added layer over pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: roya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Works excellent! I have both the heavy weight and lightweight for my child.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Both of kids LOVE their sleep sacks!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is very attached to his sleep sacks. We started him out with one as a baby because he didn't like having blankets on him. We got him larger ones as he's grown. He is now 4 years old and just fits in the large ones. We currently have 3 of them, I just replaced 2 because he wore holes in the bottom of them. They have become a kind of security blanket for him. We also recently purchased a pink one for our baby daughter, and she loves sleeping in it too!!
customer_reviews.author: BlairD

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new sleep sack. I love the hiw easy it is to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Shirley Funderburk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sleep sack
customer_reviews.text: Great material and construction, washes perfectly and keeps crib-bound kiddos warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda MC

customer_reviews.title: ... conditioned house during the summer and I suspect for cool fall evenings
customer_reviews.text: This is prefect for our air conditioned house during the summer and I suspect for cool fall evenings. Love the big zipper which makes it easy to zip on a squirmy kid, and the shoulder snaps!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleep sack!
customer_reviews.text: We used this almost every night for our son. Great product! I will say that I got the most use out of the 6-18 month size. The 18-36 month size is HUGE! And by the time kids get that old, they don't really want to be in a sleep sack any more. They want to be able to walk and move around when they wake up.
customer_reviews.author: BB Deluca

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it! Easy to put on especially! I got my baby a second one!
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son sleeps so well in these sleep sacks. They wash well too
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: The best baby sleep sack brand!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best of sleepsacks! The zipper is super durable and the snaps on top make getting those wiggly baby arms through the holes a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: CareBearD

product_meta.title: baby deedee Sleep Nest Lite Sleeping Bag Sack, Heather Teal, Medium (6-18 Months)
product_meta.description: Size:Medium (6-18 Month)| Color:Heather TealOur Heather Gray and Teal Design in Medium. The baby deedee Sleep Nest Lite is a light weight wearable blanket for babies and toddlers. Its comforting cocoon-like shape helps your child feel cozy and secure. Unique shoulder snap design enables you to place your sleeping baby in the sleep nest without waking her. Oversized and extra quiet, high-quality, reverse zipper for easy diaper changes. 100% cotton with beautiful stitching details. Small is suitable for babies 0-6 months and 10-18 lb. Medium is suitable for babies 6-18 months and 16-26 lb. Large is suitable for babies 18-36 months and 25-35 lb.
feature_bullets: GIVE YOUR BABY OR TODDLER ULTIMATE COMFORT - Our 100% Cotton, light weight, TOG 0.6, breathable sleeping suit is also arms and hands free making it the BEST sack for use in summer or warm climates

THE ORIGINAL SLEEPNEST BRAND BABY SLEEPING SACK - Soft & Cozy fabric, and a comforting cocoon shape, means a peaceful night for the whole family. Great substitute for bunting, footmuff or swaddle transition

EASY ON AND OFF and EASY CLEAN - Removable shoulder straps and a high quality reverse zipper makes placing a sleeping or standing baby in the sleep nest a cinch. Machine Washable and can be tumble dried on low heat

SAFE WEARABLE BLANKET - Ideal alternative to a loose blanket, the perfect transitional swaddles puts safety first. Hand and Arm Free. Perfect for air-conditioned homes. Recommended room temperature is 70-80 degrees
Universal sizes with lots of variations in size and color, find the perfect sleep nest for boys, girls, newborns, all ages 6, 9, 12, 18, 24, 36 months, We have a sleep nest for you

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars495 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
